Mudzalemba mawu achinsinsi patsamba lomwe mumatenga Chidziwitso Chaumwini ('Mbiri Yachinsinsi') yomwe imagwirizana ndi malamulo, malamulo, malangizo ndi zitsogozo, pocheperako, imadziwitsa ogwiritsa ntchito Zidziwitso Zazomwe Zimadziwika. idzagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi momwe ingasungidwire, ndipo izi zikuwonetsa njira zosonkhanitsira (ma cookie, ma beacons kapena njira zina) ndi kugwiritsidwa ntchito kwa chidziwitso chokhudzana ndi Services, kupeza chilolezo chidziwitso musanayambe kugwiritsa ntchito china chilichonse kutsatira matekinoloje, malinga ndi malamulo ndi malangizo ake. Chikalata Chachinsinsi choterocho chidzaphatikizaponso chidziwitso chaukadaulo chokhudzana ndi kusonkha, kutumiza ndi kusungira Chidziwitso Chazindikiritike cha ife eni kudzera mu Services. Ngati zikufunika ndi malamulo oteteza deta kapena malamulo ena, mungadziwitse anthu ena kuti mukutipatsa Zomwe Zingadziwike Kwaokha kuti atigwiritse ntchito ndipo mudzawonetsetsa kuti anthu ena onse omwe avomerezana nawo adavomereza kuwulula kwawo. Mukuvomera kutsatira malongosoledwe ndi zomwe zalembedwa zachinsinsi. 'Zidziwitso Zomwe Zingadziwike' zimatanthawuza chidziwitso chilichonse chomwe chingalumikizidwe ndi munthu aliyense, kuphatikiza dzina la munthu, adilesi, nambala yafoni, adilesi ya imelo, chidziwitso cha kirediti kadi, nambala yachitetezo cha anthu kapena chidziwitso china chofanana, utolankhani womwe izi zimasungidwa (mwachitsanzo papepala kapena pakompyuta).
13.1 Independent Parties: You and CaseAc: 13.1 Zipani Zodziyimira pawokha: Inu ndi CaseActive ndi kontrakitala odziyimira pawokha. Panganoli silimapanga mgwirizano uliwonse, mgwirizano, bungwe kapena mgwirizano pakati pa magulu. Mudzakhala ndi udindo wokhoza kuyang'anira antchito anu komanso pakubweza chilichonse, msonkho, zithandizo ndi zantchito kwa antchito anu kapena ena onse omwe akukuthandizani. Inu kapena aliyense wa antchito anu, nthumwi, kapena opereka mauthengawa, musayankhe chilichonse, zivomerezo kapena chitsimikizo kwa ife, Mgwirizanowu kapena ntchito zina kupatula zomwe zalembedwa ndi ife zolembedwa.
13.2 Assignment: Neither the Agreement n: 13.2 Kupereka Ntchito: Palibe mgwirizano kapena chilichonse mwa ufulu wanu kapena zomwe muli nazo pansi pa Panganoli sizingapatsidwe kapena kusamutsidwa, mwakugwira ntchito kwa malamulo kapena kwina, popanda chilolezo chathu choyambirira, pokhapokha atapatsidwa mwayi wopeza chiwongola dzanja, kapena kutsatira mgwirizano, kampani Kukhazikitsanso, kugulitsa kapena kusamutsa zonse kapena zonse zomwe muli nazo zikutiuza zindikirani masiku osachepera makumi atatu (30) lisanathe ntchitoyo. Ntchito yomwe mwapatsidwa, kutengera zochitika zina zilizonse, imafuna chilolezo chathu cham'mbuyo, chomwe chivomerezo sichingaletsedwe. Titha kugawa mgwirizanowu momasuka popanda chilolezo chanu. Kutengera ndi zomwe tafotokozazi, Panganoli lidzamanga ndi kuthandiza omwe ali maphwando, omwe adzalowa m'malo mwao ndi kuloledwa.
13.3 Force Majeure: Neither party will b: 13.3 Kukakamiza Majeure: Palibe gulu lomwe lidzayang'anire kuchedwa, kusokonezeka kapena kulephera kuchita chifukwa cha mgwirizanowu chifukwa chogwirizana ndi zomwe zikuyang'aniridwa ndi omwe akutsogolera, koma pokhapokha ngati zinthu zikupitilira. Kukakamiza zochitika zowonjezera zikuphatikiza, koma sikuchepera: masoka achilengedwe (monga mphezi, zivomezi, mkuntho, kusefukira); nkhondo, zipolowe, ntchito zauchifwamba, ndi ziwawa zapagulu; zochitika zonyamula anthu wamba, ndi machitidwe ena a anthu achitatu; kuphulika ndi moto; embargoes, kumenyedwa ndi mikangano yabizinesi; malamulo aboma; kulephera kwa opereka mauthenga kapena othandizira ma intaneti; Kulephera kwa othandizira achipani chachitatu, othandizira mautumiki kapena ogulitsa; ndi chifukwa china china chopitilira ulamuliro wachipani.
13.4 Choice of Law: The Agreement and an: 13.4 Kusankha Kwa Malamulo: Mgwirizanowu ndi mkangano uliwonse womwe ukuchokera kapena wokhudzana ndi Panganoli utha kuyendetsedwa ndi malamulo a State of California, osaganizira mfundo zotsutsana ndi malamulo. Mikangano yonse yochokera kapena yokhudzana ndi Mgwirizanowu idzakhala yokhazikitsidwa ndi boma la California ndi makhothi a federal ku Santa Barbara, California, ndipo maphwando avomerezana ndi makhoti awo.
13.5 E-mail and Notices: You further agr: 13.5 Imelo ndi Zidziwitso: Mukuvomerezanso kuti titha kukupatsani zidziwitso zonse, zonenedwa ndi zolumikizana zina kwa inu kudzera mu imelo, makalata, kutumiza mafayilo, kapena kutumizidwa ndi wonyamula katundu wodziwika wopita ku adilesi yosankhidwa komaliza pa Pangano. Muli ndi udindo wotipatsa zidziwitso zilizonse zosinthidwa.
13.6 No Waiver; Cumulative Remedies: No: 13.6 Palibe Wayiver; Chithandizo Cumulative: Kulephera kapena kuchepetsedwa ndi mbali iliyonse pakugwiritsa ntchito ufulu pansi pa Panganoli sipangakhale kopanda ufulu. Zina kuposa zomwe zafotokozedwa apa, zithandizo zomwe zaperekedwa apa ndizowonjezereka, ndipo siziphatikiza pazithandizo zilizonse zaphwando palamulo kapena mokulira.
13.7 Severability: If any provision of t: 13.7 Kusinthika: Ngati lingaliro lililonse lagwirizanowu likusungidwa ndi bwalo lamilandu lovomerezeka kuti likhale losemphana ndi lamulo, lamuloli lidzasinthidwa ndi khothi ndikutanthauzira kuti likwaniritse bwino zolinga zakupereka koyambirira malinga ndi kololedwa kwathunthu Malamulo, ndi zina zonse za mgwirizanowu zidzakhalabe zogwira ntchito.
13.8 Entire Agreement: To the maximum ex: 13.8 Chigwirizano Chonse: Kufikira pamlingo wololedwa ndi lamulo loyenera, Panganoli, limodzi ndi zolemba zomwe zafotokozedwa pano ndi Mafomu onse a Order ndi kutsitsa, zimapanga mgwirizano wonse pakati pamagulu mokhudza nkhani yake, ndikuyang'anira zonse zam'mbuyo komanso zoyendetsedwa kale. mgwirizano wamalingaliro, malingaliro kapena zoyimira, zolembedwa kapena zakamlomo, pankhani yokhudza mgwirizanowu. Palibe choyimira, kuchita kapena lonjezo lomwe lidzatengedwe kuperekedwa kapena kuwonetsedwa kuchokera pachilichonse chomwe chanenedwa kapena kulembedwa pakukambirana pakati pa magulu asanafike Panganoli pokhapokha ngati zikufotokozedwa bwino mu Panganoli. Palibe gulu lomwe lingakhale ndi yankho pokana chilichonse chabodza chomwe chipanicho chimadalira kuti chimalowa mu Panganoli (pokhapokha ngati zabodza izi zidanenedwa mwachinyengo) ndikuti lingaliro lokhalo lazachipani linganenedwe kuphwanya mgwirizanowu malinga ndi Panganoli. Mukuvomereza ndikuvomereza kuti mgwirizano wanu pompano sukutengera momwe mungagwiritsire ntchito mtsogolo kapena mawonekedwe omwe sanafotokozedwe pano kapena mu Fomu Lalamulo kapena kutengera mawu apakamwa kapena olembedwa, ndemanga za anthu onse kapena zachinsinsi zomwe tapanga pankhani yamtsogolo mtsogolo pa Ntchito. Pakakhala kusamvana kulikonse pakati pa zinthu zomwe zili mu General Terms of Service iyi ndi Fomu ya Order kapena Maofesi Oonjezera a Ntchito, mawu a Order Fomu kapena Maumisili Ena Oonjezera adzagwirira ntchito, mpaka pamtsutsowo. Palibe mawu kapena zinthu zomwe zanenedwa mu oda yanu yogula kapena chilichonse chomwe mungasankhe kuti zilembedwe ziyenera kuphatikizidwa kapena kupanga gawo lililonse la Panganoli, ndipo mfundo zonsezi sizikhala zopanda ntchito.
13.9 Export: Both parties agree to compl: 13.9 Kutumiza Kunja: Magulu onsewa amavomereza kuti azitsatira malamulo othandizira kunja ndi ku US ndi kutumizira kunja. Simuyenera kuloleza ogwiritsa ntchito kuti azitsata kapena kugwiritsa ntchito Services pophwanya lamulo lililonse loletsa kutumiza ku US, kuletsa kapena kuletsa.
13.10 Publicity: We may not name you as: 13.10 Kulengeza: Sitikukutcha iwe ngati wogwiritsa ntchito Services popanda chilolezo chako.
13.11 Links to Third Party Sites: The Se: 13.11 Maulalo ku Masamba A Chipani Chachitatu: Mautumiki kapena tsamba lathu la webusayiti lingaphatikizepo maulalo a tsamba lachitatu ('Malo Ogwirizanitsidwa'). Masamba Ogwirizanitsidwa sakhala m'manja mwathu ndipo sitingayang'anire zomwe zili patsamba lililonse lolumikizidwa, kuphatikiza popanda malire aliwonse omwe ali mu Lumikizano Lophatikizidwa, kapena kusintha kulikonse kapena zosintha pa Webusayiti Yogwirizanitsidwa kapena Ntchito zoperekedwa kudzera pa Webusayiti Yogwirizanitsidwa. Tikupereka malumikizowa kwa inu ngati mwayi, ndipo kuphatikiza kwa ulalo uliwonse sikutanthauza kuti tsambali ndi chilichonse chogwirizana ndi tsambalo.
13.12 You consent to receive emails, pho: 13.12 Mumavomereza kulandira maimelo, mafoni ndi ma SMS kuchokera ku CaseActive kuti mupereke zosintha pa oda yanu ndi / kapena pazotsatsa. Kuchuluka kwa uthenga kumadalira zochita zanu. Mutha kutuluka posafufuza zidziwitso zaakaunti yanu kapena kuchotsa akaunti yanu. Mauthenga ndi ma data atha kugwiritsidwa ntchito.
